creator: support@ubikloadpack.com
text:
It would be nice to have this feature which would allow easy detection of variabilized parameters/headers.


The usage would be:
- Record
- Variabilize
- Run checker

Compare with initial recording request/responses.

When you code a new Test Plan on an application that has many dynamic fields that need to be variabilized to make the plan work (headers, parameters...).

How do you proceed currently ?:
- You record
- You try to guess the dynamic parameters , and here is the problem. Unless you know the technology , your only option is to compare runs and see what changes.

So the idea here is to allow comparing side by side 2 runs and thus making it much more productive and easy to find the dynamic fields.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
